name: Sky Blue (Johnsensei)
description:
Every decision in life has a cost of life in the form of HP. Guide John around town as he looks for a new apartment and a job. Survive for 12 months to win the game.

Created for the Ludum Dare 44 game jam where the them was "Your life is currency."

Arrow Keys- Controller D-pad/Left Stick: Move character

Enter/Space/X Button (PS4)/A Button (XBOX/PC): Action Button, hold to fast forward

Shift/Square Button (PS4)/X Button (XBOX/PC): Hold to run

Esc/X Key/Triangle Button (PS4)/Y Button (XBOX/PC): Cancel, Back

Recommended browsers: Chrome or Firefox. Download on Windows or Mac for faster load times and full gaming experience.
